titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TREATMENT TYPE FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS - Description

div.p: TREATMENT TYPE FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS is the same as attribute TREATMENT TYPE FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, where a PATIENT had both types of treatment during a Neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD, National Code 'Surgical Treatment' should be submitted.
